ArchMage.skill_description: Deals 100 magic damage to all enemies within 3 cells and reduces their magic resistance by 15 for 3 turns
ArchMage.flavor_text: "You shall not pass!" - Gandalf, The Lord of the Rings

ArcherMan.skill_description: Shoots an arrow that penetrates through targets, dealing 45 damage to up to 3 enemies in a line
ArcherMan.flavor_text: "Aim small, miss small." - Benjamin Martin, The Patriot

CavalierMan.skill_description: Charges 3 cells forward, dealing 50 damage and stunning enemies in the path for 1 turn
CavalierMan.flavor_text: "Cry 'Havoc!', and let slip the dogs of war." - Julius Caesar, Shakespeare's Julius Caesar

CrossBowMan.skill_description: Rapidly fires 3 bolts at random enemies within range, each dealing 30 damage
CrossBowMan.flavor_text: "I love the smell of napalm in the morning." - Lt. Kilgore, Apocalypse Now

HalberMan.skill_description: Spins with halberd, dealing 70 damage to all adjacent enemies
HalberMan.flavor_text: "What we do in life echoes in eternity." - Maximus, Gladiator

HorseMan.skill_description: Moves up to 8 cells and attacks, dealing 150% damage if moves at least 5 cells

KingMan.skill_description: Increases armor and damage of all allies within 4 cells by 10 for 3 turns
KingMan.flavor_text: "Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown." - Henry IV, Shakespeare's Henry IV Part 2

Mage.skill_description: Launches an ice projectile that deals 80 damage and reduces target's speed by 2 for 2 turns
Mage.flavor_text: "Winter is coming." - Eddard Stark, Game of Thrones

PrinceMan.skill_description: Deals 60 damage and heals self for 50% of damage dealt
PrinceMan.flavor_text: "Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it." - Nelson Mandela

ShieldMan.skill_description: Reduces damage taken by adjacent allies by 20% for 2 turns
ShieldMan.flavor_text: "Hold the line! Stay with me!" - Captain Miller, Saving Private Ryan

SpearMan.skill_description: Throws spear to farthest enemy in range, dealing 100% damage ignoring armor

ArmoredBearRider.skill_description: Bear attacks twice in quick succession, each dealing 40 damage
ArmoredBearRider.flavor_text: "I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse." - Vito Corleone, The Godfather

BearRider.skill_description: Charges forward 5 cells, knocking back enemies and dealing 55 damage
BearRider.flavor_text: "I feel the need... the need for speed!" - Maverick, Top Gun

Demolitionist.skill_description: Throws dynamite that explodes after 1 turn, dealing 150 damage in 2-cell radius

Grenade.skill_description: Explodes on death, dealing 200 damage to all within 2 cells
Grenade.flavor_text: "Boom. You lookin' for this?" - Tony Stark, Iron Man 3

Grenadier.skill_description: Lobs grenade that deals 100 splash damage in 2-cell radius
Grenadier.flavor_text: "I have come here to chew bubblegum and kick ass... and I'm all out of bubblegum." - Nada, They Live

Hunter.skill_description: Deals 70 damage and marks target, increasing damage taken by 20% for 3 turns

King.skill_description: Increases max health of all dwarf allies by 25% for 3 turns
King.flavor_text: "The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword." - Eddard Stark, Game of Thrones

Miner.skill_description: Generates 15 gold at start of each turn
Miner.flavor_text: "All that glitters is not gold." - Shakespeare's The Merchant of Venice

Rifleman.skill_description: 25% chance to instantly kill non-boss enemies
Rifleman.flavor_text: "Do I feel lucky? Well, do ya, punk?" - Harry Callahan, Dirty Harry

Shieldbreaker.flavor_text: "I drink your milkshake!" - Daniel Plainview, There Will Be Blood

Warrior.skill_description: Gains +10 damage for every 25% health missing

ArcaneArcher.skill_description: Arrows pierce targets and explode for 40 splash damage on impact
ArcaneArcher.flavor_text: "You have my bow." - Legolas, The Lord of the Rings

HorseMan.skill_description: Can move through obstacles and enemies
HorseMan.flavor_text: "I'm king of the world!" - Jack, Titanic

Mage.skill_description: Summons roots that immobilize enemies in 3-cell radius for 1 turn
Mage.flavor_text: "The force will be with you, always." - Obi-Wan Kenobi, Star Wars

PegasusRider.skill_description: Flies over obstacles, landing on target dealing 60 AoE damage
PegasusRider.flavor_text: "Why so serious?" - The Joker, The Dark Knight

Queen.skill_description: Heals all allies within 5 cells for 100 health
Queen.flavor_text: "After all this time? Always." - Severus Snape, Harry Potter

SpearMan.skill_description: Attacks all adjacent enemies in 360-degree arc

SpellSword.skill_description: Melee attacks restore 20 mana per hit
SpellSword.flavor_text: "The greatest trick the devil ever pulled was convincing the world he didn't exist." - Verbal Kint, The Usual Suspects

SwordMan.skill_description: Evades next attack after moving 3+ cells
SwordMan.flavor_text: "I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer." - Paul Atreides, Dune

Warden.skill_description: Creates barrier absorbing 300 damage for allies within 3 cells
Warden.flavor_text: "With great power comes great responsibility." - Uncle Ben, Spider-Man

DryadDeer.skill_description: Spawns healing flowers restoring 50 HP/turn in adjacent cells
DryadDeer.flavor_text: "Life finds a way." - Dr. Ian Malcolm, Jurassic Park

DryadEnchantress.skill_description: Charms enemy to fight for your side for 2 turns
DryadEnchantress.flavor_text: "I'm also just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her." - Anna, Notting Hill

DryadHuntress.skill_description: Arrows inflict poison dealing 30 damage/turn for 3 turns
DryadHuntress.flavor_text: "I volunteer as tribute!" - Katniss Everdeen, The Hunger Games

Fairy.skill_description: Blinds target, reducing its attack range to melee for 2 turns
Fairy.flavor_text: "I do believe in fairies!" - Peter Pan

Pixie.skill_description: Causes target to attack nearest ally next turn
Pixie.flavor_text: "Oh, yes... the past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it or learn from it." - Rafiki, The Lion King

SatyrDruid.skill_description: Heals all allies for 15% max HP over 3 turns
SatyrDruid.flavor_text: "The woods are lovely, dark and deep." - Robert Frost, Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening

SatyrWarrior.skill_description: Gains +5 damage per consecutive attack on same target

Treant.skill_description: Roots self to gain 50 armor but cannot move for 3 turns
Treant.flavor_text: "I am Groot." - Groot, Guardians of the Galaxy

TreantGuard.skill_description: Throws explosive seeds dealing 100 damage in 3-cell radius
TreantGuard.flavor_text: "Feed me, Seymour!" - Audrey II, Little Shop of Horrors

Satyr.skill_description: Charges forward 4 cells, pushing enemies back and dealing 60 damage
Satyr.flavor_text: "To infinity and beyond!" - Buzz Lightyear, Toy Story

YoungDryad.skill_description: Heals self for 30 HP when ending turn in sunlight

Angel.skill_description: Revives one dead ally with 50% HP
Angel.flavor_text: "Get busy living, or get busy dying." - Andy Dufresne, The Shawshank Redemption

ArchAngel.skill_description: Calls down holy light dealing 150 damage to all enemies in line of sight
ArchAngel.flavor_text: "I am vengeance! I am the night! I am Batman!" - Batman

BattlePriest.skill_description: Melee attacks burn enemies for 20 damage/turn for 3 turns
BattlePriest.flavor_text: "The power of Christ compels you!" - Father Merrin, The Exorcist

Crusader.flavor_text: "No man can kill me!" - Witch-king, The Lord of the Rings

CrusaderArcher.skill_description: Removes all buffs from target before dealing damage
CrusaderArcher.flavor_text: "You can't handle the truth!" - Colonel Jessup, A Few Good Men

CrusaderCaptain.skill_description: Nearby allies gain +20% damage and speed
CrusaderCaptain.flavor_text: "Today we celebrate our independence day!" - President Whitmore, Independence Day

CrusaderCaptainFlagless.skill_description: Cannot be stunned or moved against will
CrusaderCaptainFlagless.flavor_text: "I'm not locked in here with you. You're locked in here with me!" - Rorschach, Watchmen

CrusaderFlag.skill_description: Increases critical chance of all allies by 15% while alive
CrusaderFlag.flavor_text: "A day may come when the courage of men fails... but it is not this day." - Aragorn, The Lord of the Rings

CrusaderHorseMan.skill_description: Deals double damage to demon/undead enemies
CrusaderHorseMan.flavor_text: "Say hello to my little friend!" - Tony Montana, Scarface

HighPriestess.skill_description: Revives all dead allies in 5-cell radius with 30% HP

Paladin1.skill_description: Deals 100 damage and silences target for 2 turns
Paladin1.flavor_text: "May the Force be with you." - Star Wars

Paladin3.skill_description: Reduces magic damage taken by nearby allies by 30%

Priest.skill_description: Heals target for 120 HP and removes debuffs
Priest.flavor_text: "Here's looking at you, kid." - Rick, Casablanca

ClawedDemon.skill_description: Attacks cause bleeding dealing 40 damage/turn for 3 turns
ClawedDemon.flavor_text: "I am the devil, and I'm here to do the devil's business." - Ruby, Supernatural

DemonFireKeeper.skill_description: Summons fire pillars dealing 50 damage/turn in 3 cells
DemonFireKeeper.flavor_text: "All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy." - Jack Torrance, The Shining

DemonFireThrower.skill_description: Throws firebomb dealing 80 damage and creating burning zone
DemonFireThrower.flavor_text: "I am serious. And don't call me Shirley." - Dr. Rumack, Airplane!

DemonLord.skill_description: Deals 200 damage to all enemies and heals self for 50% of damage
DemonLord.flavor_text: "I see dead people." - Cole, The Sixth Sense

DemonTormentor.skill_description: Reduces target's damage by 50% and armor by 10 for 3 turns
DemonTormentor.flavor_text: "We all go a little mad sometimes." - Norman Bates, Psycho

Demoness.skill_description: Steals 50 mana from target per attack
Demoness.flavor_text: "I'm not bad. I'm just drawn that way." - Jessica Rabbit, Who Framed Roger Rabbit

FireBall.skill_description: Explodes on impact dealing 250 damage in 3-cell radius
FireBall.flavor_text: "Play it, Sam. Play 'As Time Goes By.'" - Ilsa, Casablanca

FireImp.skill_description: Shoots fireballs that splash for 20 damage to nearby enemies
FireImp.flavor_text: "I'm the king of the world!" - Jack, Titanic

HighDemon.skill_description: Jumps to target location dealing 100 AoE damage on landing
HighDemon.flavor_text: "I have had it with these motherf***ing snakes on this motherf***ing plane!" - Neville, Snakes on a Plane

Imp.skill_description: Reduces target's attack speed by 0.5 for 2 turns

Succubus.skill_description: Charms enemy to move toward her for 1 turn
Succubus.flavor_text: "They call me Mister Tibbs!" - Virgil Tibbs, In the Heat of the Night

Trident.skill_description: When carried by demon, increases their damage by 30%
Trident.flavor_text: "My precious." - Gollum, The Lord of the Rings

ArchLich.skill_description: Creates decaying zone dealing 100 damage/turn for 3 turns
ArchLich.flavor_text: "The stuff that dreams are made of." - Sam Spade, The Maltese Falcon

Banshee.skill_description: Stuns all enemies in cone for 1 turn
Banshee.flavor_text: "I'm the king of the world!" - Jack, Titanic

BansheeQueen.skill_description: Deals 150 damage and silences enemies in large area
BansheeQueen.flavor_text: "Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn." - Rhett Butler, Gone with the Wind

DeathKnight.skill_description: Pulls target to melee range and attacks

DeathLord.skill_description: Nearby undead regenerate 5% HP per turn
DeathLord.flavor_text: "I am your father." - Darth Vader, Star Wars

DreadKnight.skill_description: Becomes ethereal during movement, avoiding attacks

Ghost.skill_description: Passes through walls and units, dealing damage on phasing
Ghost.flavor_text: "I see dead people." - Cole, The Sixth Sense

Ghoul.skill_description: Heals self for 100% of damage dealt to living units

Lich.skill_description: Freezes enemies in 3-cell radius, rooting them for 2 turns
Lich.flavor_text: "Winter is coming." - Eddard Stark, Game of Thrones

Necromancer.skill_description: Resurrects nearby corpses as Skeleton Warriors
Necromancer.flavor_text: "The dead know only one thing: it is better to be alive." - Joker, Full Metal Jacket

Reaper.flavor_text: "I am death, destroyer of worlds." - J. Robert Oppenheimer

Skeleton.skill_description: Splits into two 30HP skeletons on death

SkeletonArcher.skill_description: Arrows reduce target's armor by 5 per hit
SkeletonArcher.flavor_text: "You talkin' to me?" - Travis Bickle, Taxi Driver

SkeletonHorseman.skill_description: Deals double damage if moves 4+ cells before attacking

SkeletonMage.flavor_text: "Magic is just science we don't understand yet." - Arthur C. Clarke

SkeletonWarrior.skill_description: Gains +10 armor when adjacent to other skeletons
SkeletonWarrior.flavor_text: "Tis but a scratch!" - Black Knight, Monty Python

SoulCollector.skill_description: Steals 50 mana from all enemies within 5 cells per turn
SoulCollector.flavor_text: "I drink your milkshake!" - Daniel Plainview, There Will Be Blood

SpikedGhoul.skill_description: Deals 30 damage to attackers when hit

Zombie.skill_description: Infects target, dealing 20 damage/turn until dead
Zombie.flavor_text: "They're coming to get you, Barbara!" - Johnny, Night of the Living Dead

ZombieButcher.skill_description: Critical hits dismember target, reducing max HP by 20%

ZombieCrusher.skill_description: Stuns target for 1 turn on hit

ZombieCrusher2.skill_description: Deals splash damage to adjacent enemies
ZombieCrusher2.flavor_text: "I feel the need... the need for speed!" - Maverick, Top Gun

ZombieCrusher3.skill_description: Destroys obstacles in path when moving

ZombieDog.skill_description: Gains +50% speed when chasing wounded prey
ZombieDog.flavor_text: "Bad dogs! Bad dogs! Whatcha gonna do?" - Various

ZombieRunner.skill_description: Reduces target's speed by 3 for 2 turns

ZombieWarrior.skill_description: Revives once with 50% HP after dying

Anvil.skill_description: Increases quality of items crafted by blacksmiths
Anvil.flavor_text: "If you build it, he will come." - Field of Dreams

Blacksmith.skill_description: Repairs 20 armor per turn for adjacent mechanical units
Blacksmith.flavor_text: "A man's got to know his limitations." - Harry Callahan, Dirty Harry

Gatherer.skill_description: Collects 10 resources per turn from forests/mines

GraveDigger.skill_description: Prevents corpses from rising as undead

Hunter.skill_description: Places trap that roots first enemy stepping on it
Hunter.flavor_text: "It's a trap!" - Admiral Ackbar, Star Wars

Lumberjack.flavor_text: "I'm the king of the world!" - Jack, Titanic

NobleMan.skill_description: Generates 15 gold per turn from nearby houses
NobleMan.flavor_text: "A penny saved is a penny earned." - Benjamin Franklin

NobleWoman.skill_description: Heals adjacent villagers for 20 HP per turn
NobleWoman.flavor_text: "No one is useless in this world." - The Secret Garden

Nun.skill_description: Heals adjacent units for 30 HP per turn
Nun.flavor_text: "God forgives. I don't." - Lara Croft, Tomb Raider

OldMan.skill_description: Increases XP gain of nearby units by 20%

OldWoman.skill_description: Reduces fear effects on nearby units by 50%
OldWoman.flavor_text: "I'm too old for this shit." - Roger Murtaugh, Lethal Weapon

Peasant.flavor_text: "You reap what you sow." - Bible, Galatians 6:7

Princess.skill_description: Prevents first death of adjacent ally each battle
Princess.flavor_text: "A princess is never late. Everyone else is simply early." - Princess Diaries

Queen.flavor_text: "I am the queen of all I survey." - Various

SuspiciousMerchant.flavor_text: "Follow the money." - Deep Throat, All the President's Men

Thief.skill_description: Steals 10 gold per turn from enemies in melee

VillagerMan.flavor_text: "If you build it, they will come." - Field of Dreams

VillagerWoman.skill_description: Gathers healing herbs restoring 25 HP per turn
VillagerWoman.flavor_text: "A spoonful of sugar helps the medicine go down." - Mary Poppins

Worker.flavor_text: "I like to work. I enjoy work." - Various
